Package index

All functions

DAGassist()
Run the DAGassist pipeline and produce a compact report (console/LaTeX/Word/Excel/Text)
bad_controls_in()
flag bad controls (mediator/collider/desc of Y) among a candidate set
classify_nodes()
Classify DAG nodes
compare_specs()
Compare original vs minimal adjustment specification
partial_test_df
Partial demo data (missing some variables)
pick_minimal_controls()
compute minimal adjustment sets and pick one deterministically
print(<DAGassist_compare>)
Prints a concise comparison report
print(<DAGassist_report>)
Print method for DAGassist reports
print(<DAGassist_roles>)
Pretty-print node classifications (aligned)
print(<DAGassist_validation>)
Minimal, clean printout for validation results with color coding
test_collider
Demo DAG with a collider
test_complex
Demo DAG with confounder, mediator, collider
test_confounder
Demo DAG with a confounder
test_cycle
Cyclic DAG used to trigger acyclicity errors
test_dags
Example DAGs for demos and tests
test_df
Demo data frame consistent with demo DAG
test_mediator
Demo DAG with a confounder
test_multimin
DAG with two minimal adjustment sets
test_multimin4
DAG with four minimal adjustment sets
update_to_controls()
update formula Update a formula to use chosen controls NOTE: this will be used later when we compute minimal and canonical adjustment sets
validate_spec()
Validate dag, formula, data before fitting and ensure exposure and outcome are specified
